name: 王耀德
objective: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。(10)薄膜特性之檢測
schedule:
1:Introduction
2:Classical Transport Theory
3:Crystal Structures
4:Concept of Quantum Theory
5:Band Theory
6:Properties of Semiconductors
7:Properties of Thin Films
8:Midterm Exam
9:Vacuum Science
10:Vacuum Technology
11:Thin Film Process
12:Deposition Techniques
13:Deposition Techniques
14:Thin Film Analysis
15:Characterization of Thin Films
16:Special Topics
17:special Topics
18:Final Exam
materials:
Thin-Film Deposition, by Donald L. Smith
Materials Science of Thin Films, by Milton Ohring
